sentences.en: But how shall we expect charity towards others , when we are uncharitable to ourselves?
sentences.cn: 但是, 我们对待自己都不仁慈的时候,又怎么可能善待他人?

sentences.en: He believed in the religion which he taught , harsh , unpalatable , uncharitable as that religion was.
sentences.cn: 他相信自己宣讲的那种宗教信仰,虽然那种信仰严厉讨厌, 苛刻无情.

sentences.en: This was an uncharitable assessment of the reasons for the failure.
sentences.cn: 这是对失败原因毫不讲情面的分析评估。

words.tran_cn: 严厉的；无情的；不宽恕的；无慈悲心的

trans.tran_cn: 不宽厚的，严厉的，无情的，不公平的
